column1: '''Some Contributions to Middle-English Lexicography''' is the title of an essay by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. In Part I Tolkien discusses aspects of a variety of [[Middle English]] words and their Modern English meanings. Part II consists of a series of notes on the glossary to the Early English Text Society Edition of ''[[Wikipedia:Katherine Group
The essay was first published in [[The Review of English Studies (Vol. 1  No. 2)
column2: ''The Review of English Studies'', Vol. 1  No. 2]] (April 1925), and was reprinted in [[The Review of English Studies (Vol. 1)
